text: The third season of the German singing competition The Masked Singer premiered on October 20, 2020 on ProSieben. This season in the panel were Bülent Ceylan and Sonja Zietlow, replacing Ruth Moschner and Rea Garvey. Matthias Opdenhövel also returned as host. ==Panelists and host== On April 24, 2020, ProSieben announced the third season. Matthias Opdenhövel returned as host. On August 2020, it was announced that Ruth Moschner and Rea Garvey would not be returning in the panelist for this season, but they will be returning in the fourth season, which will be premiere on 2021. On September 15, 2020, ProSieben announced that contestants from season one Bülent Ceylan and from season two Sonja Zietlow will be in the panel. Also in this season, after in every live episode, was aired a spin-off show with the name The Masked Singer - red. Special, the hosts was again Viviane Geppert. ===Guest panelists=== Also this season, various guest panelists appeared as the third judge in the judging panel for one episode.
